Class JSON

  • java.lang.Object
    • JSON

  • public class JSON
extends java.lang.Object
    CS2212 6_TheWeather JSON.java This class is responsible for querying the OpenWeatherMap API and saving all required data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String TIMEOUT_MESSAGE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSON(java.lang.String l)
      Returns a JSON object to use for obtaining weather data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Current updateCurrentWeatherData()
      Method to initialize and update all current data as specified in the project specifications from the OpenWeatherMap API
      LongTerm updateLongTermData()
      Get the Long Term Data from the OpenWeatherMap (OWM) API.
      Mars updateMarsData()
      Get the Mars Data from the Mars Weather (marsweather.ingenology.com) API.
      ShortTerm updateShortTermData()
      Get the ShortTerm Data from the OpenWeatherMap API.

      • JSON

        public JSON(java.lang.String l)
        Returns a JSON object to use for obtaining weather data.
        Parameters:
        l - the string for the location JSON object will be grabbing.

    • Method Detail

      • updateCurrentWeatherData

        public Current updateCurrentWeatherData()
                                 throws NoConnectionException,
                                        InternalServerError,
                                        BadLocationException
        Method to initialize and update all current data as specified in the project specifications from the OpenWeatherMap API
        Returns:
        A Current Object with all required fields thrown
        Throws:
        NoConnectionException - Throws this exception whenever the server returns anything other than a 200 (HTTP OK) or 500 (Internal Server Error) Response code, specified timeout message on timeout exception
        InternalServerError - Throws this exception whenever the server returns a 500 response code
        BadLocationException

      • updateShortTermData

        public ShortTerm updateShortTermData()
                              throws NoConnectionException,
                                     InternalServerError,
                                     BadLocationException
        Get the ShortTerm Data from the OpenWeatherMap API. Returns all fields specified by project specifications.
        Returns:
        ShortTerm object initialized with array of 8 hourly objects
        Throws:
        NoConnectionException - Throws this exception whenever the server returns anything other than a 200 (HTTP OK) or 500 (Internal Server Error) Response code, specified timeout message on timeout exception
        InternalServerError - Throws this exception whenever the server returns a 500 response code
        BadLocationException

      • updateLongTermData

        public LongTerm updateLongTermData()
                            throws NoConnectionException,
                                   InternalServerError,
                                   BadLocationException
        Get the Long Term Data from the OpenWeatherMap (OWM) API. Returns all fields specified by project specifications. Returns temperature as the "day" field returned from the OWM API
        Returns:
        LongTerm object initialized with 5 Daily objects
        Throws:
        NoConnectionException - Throws this exception whenever the server returns anything other than a 200 (HTTP OK) or 500 (Internal Server Error) Response code, specified timeout message on timeout exception
        InternalServerError - Throws this exception whenever the server returns a 500 response code
        BadLocationException

      • updateMarsData

        public Mars updateMarsData()
                    throws NoConnectionException,
                           InternalServerError,
                           BadLocationException
        Get the Mars Data from the Mars Weather (marsweather.ingenology.com) API. Returns all fields specified by project specifications.
        Returns:
        Mars object containing initialized parameters from the Mars weather API. Returns average values if Mars weather API returns null values
        Throws:
        NoConnectionException - Throws this exception whenever the server returns anything other than a 200 (HTTP OK) or 500 (Internal Server Error) Response code, specified timeout message on timeout exception
        InternalServerError - Throws this exception whenever the server returns a 500 response code
        BadLocationException
